markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Unseen Servant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This creature can be summoned with the spell _[Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)_.

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Unseen Servant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 380 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +0; darkvision

**Languages**
- (understands its creator)

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Invisible**  An unseen servant is invisible, though it normally doesn’t Sneak, so it is usually only hidden.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +0 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +0 

</row>

**HP** 4

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) attacks, [paralysis](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
all damage 5 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) or [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 30 feet

**Force Body**   An unseen servant’s physical body is made of force. It can’t use attack actions. It can move and use Interact actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can’t pass through solid objects.

</column>
name: Unseen Servant
resistance_raw: all damage 5 (except  force  or   ghost touch  )

It can’t use attack actions. It can move and use Interact actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can’t pass through solid objects.
